about_the_game:
A Brave Knight and a Sassy, Magical Cat—What Kind of Chaos Will Unfold on Their Adventure?

Blade of Wiz – A Top-Down Roguelike Action Game!

In Blade of Wiz, join forces with your feline companion to battle fierce enemies! Don’t worry if you fail—after all, the cat has nine lives! With each cycle, it’s not just your combat skills that grow stronger, but the bond between you and your magical cat as well…

Prepare for Battle

Gear up at the camp before each fight! Unlock powerful combo skills with your black cat for seamless teamwork. Other camp features will unlock as you explore further.

Master the Elements

Raw strength isn’t enough. Combine elements like fire, ice, and lightning for powerful attacks. With over 40 sigils to customize your style, the possibilities are endless. Get creative and conquer the battlefield!

Venture into the Imperial Castle

Plan your route carefully—each event on the map offers unique opportunities, from mysterious merchants to high-risk, high-reward challenges.

Time matters too! As day turns to night, enemies grow deadlier, and harsher effects take hold. Will you rush ahead or carefully plan your route?

Game Features:

  • 10+ hours of gameplay, packed with action and adventure!

  • 3 epic chapters, each with 10+ levels to conquer—every door hides a new mystery.

  • Dive into various side quests that reveal the secrets of this ancient castle.

  • Elemental magic at your fingertips—fire, ice, lightning, and more—create stunning combos in battle.

  • 40+ emblems to discover, letting you build a playstyle that’s all your own.

Join the adventure and give your cat a helping paw! (>^ω^

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit 及以上
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.4 GHz 及以上
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 及以上

short_description: A female knight returns to her cursed kingdom after years of battle. On her journey, she meets a magical black cat, and their fates become entwined. Together, they venture into a mysterious, perilous realm of magic, facing unknown enemies and uncovering the truth of an ancient mystery.
